title: Serif font (need quite an exact match) Font seems a bit similar to DTLElzevirTBook
content:
Hello,

I have been asked to match a font used for an authors name on a previous set of books she has written  
(to keep a consistent style). Problem is I am dealing with a new publisher who doesn't know the previous font used.

Originally I had designed the cover with the font DTLElzevirTBook and it is quite similar, but not the same.  
Here is a screenshot of the font I am after (in the blue).  
Thanks for any help with can give ;)

Thanks

Jason

Font: 

 Janson 

Solved By: 

 [Renko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415030719/http:/typophile.com/user/12000 "View user profile.")

author: Rawshock Design

comments.content:
Hi both,  
Yes I also came up with Janson as I waited on your answer.  
 I think this is close enough. Thanks again!
